title: WyldCard
description: A PWA that allows members to generate digital greeting cards for different occassions and download them as a PDF. Built with HTML, CSS, MDBootstrap, JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and Mongoose. Plaid and Dwolla currently being implemented to give users the ability to send money along with the digital card.

title: Nuz
description: An article analysis website built with HTML, CSS, Tachyons, JavaScript, and jQuery.

title: The Village
description: A community message board application that allows users to post messages that only users in their area code can see. Built using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript, jQuery, Handlebars, Node.js, Express.js, Sequelize, and mySQL.

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: A day planner website built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, and moment.js

title: Code Quiz
description: A quiz website Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Weather website built with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, and jQuery
